item.title: 2025 09 28 the Greatest Gift
item.description: Theme and targeted passages We can receive no greater gift than a relationship with God. Targeted passages: Romans 5:6-11,18-21 I agree with the opening thesis above. I strongly question whether the targeted passages give us the means to achieve that. I might have started with something like Isaiah 56.
